name: Smith
tagline: You solve problems in metal. Defense, tools, and battlefield pragmatism.

name: Leatherworker
tagline: You weave strength into hides and straps. Quiet resilience, travel survival.

name: Relicator
tagline: If you’ve seen a wondrous thing, you can echo it. Magic with rules… and loopholes.

name: Alchemist
tagline: Concoctions, catalysts, and controlled chaos. Your lab is a suitcase.

name: Architect / Builder
tagline: You read space like a spell. Bridges, shelters, fortifications, secrets in stone.

name: Historian / Chronicler
tagline: You collect the truth—sometimes against its will. Names, dates, motives.

name: Cartographer
tagline: You turn the unknown into lines and legend. The road confesses to you.

name: Quartermaster
tagline: Logistics is war by other means. You keep people alive with planning.

name: Information Broker
tagline: You sniff out the league’s rot. Contacts, debts, secrets, leverage.

name: Bard
tagline: You move hearts—and crowds. Stories are weapons; songs are locks and keys.
